New Records: Kusal Mendis scored 60 runs for Sri Lanka, breaking a significant personal record in this match
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 2 wickets with 4 balls remaining in the 19.2 overs
Kusal Mendis was named Player of the Match for his impactful performance
Post-Match Reflections: Kusal Mendis reflected on his performance and the team's resilience after the narrow win
The match was a pivotal moment in Sri Lanka's journey in the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the 1755th T20I match played
The match marked the debut of Ebadot Hossain and Asitha Fernando in international cricket
Others: The match was held at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium
The umpires for the match were Ahmad Shah Pakteen, Anil Chaudhary, Bismillah Jan Shinwari, and Jayaraman Madanagopal
Jeff Crowe was the match referee
